title: Hi City
extendedDescription: Hi City is a simple welcome page application that dynamically changes the title and background based on the user's current time. It was developed using Google's Custom Search API to fetch background images.

features.name: Time-based Greeting
features.description: Dynamic welcome messages that adapt to the time of day.

features.name: Background Customization
features.description: Automatic background updates based on the user's local time.

features.name: Google API Integration
features.description: Real-time background fetching with Google Custom Search API.
